about_the_game:
MAJOR UPDATE - NUMBERS ARCHERY & NUMBERS WHACK ADDED



Numbers and Letters - educational virtual reality game

  • Embark on a epic journey of self-discovery and improvement.
  • Where numbers & letters come alive..
  • Unlock the power of mathematical thinking and literacy..
  • Explore the game world..
  • Embrace your mathematical and literacy powers, become the hero of your own story..

Mathematics puzzle number game for everyone.

Improve your mental computation skills to become better at quick calculations and estimations

Practice mathematics and solve equations in virtual reality in standing or sitting mode.

The game objective is to solve equation(s) to achieve the target number given with the numbers provided using addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

The Numbers game has three modes with four levels of difficulty in each mode

  • Arcade – complete 20 equations successfully in the shortest possible time
  • Time trial – complete as many equations successfully in 5 minutes
  • Survival - endless level where a correct answer is needed to proceed

Compete against the clock, earn achievements and a place on the leader boards

The game allows you to understand the role of numerical relations and operators in mathematical problem solving while exploring number combinations and range of operators (subtraction, addition, multiplication and division) to solve equations. It can help to develop adaptive number knowledge skills and mathematical proficiency through exploring different strategies based on understanding of key concepts

Reverse mode

The objective is select the correct answer from the numbers provided by solving the equation given where difficulty level is decided by complexity and the number of steps taken to get to the answer.

NEW- Numbers Archery and Numbers Whack now available

  • Archery – master the bow and arrow to earn achievements
  • Whack – conquer the hammer to whack your way up the leader boards

Letters game

Improve your literacy skills and become better at spelling. The objective of the game is to complete the word by finding the missing letter. Play in virtual reality in standing or sitting mode

The Letters game has three modes:
  • Arcade – complete 20 words successfully in the shortest possible time
  • Time trial – complete as many words successfully in 5 minutes
  • Survival - endless level where a correct answer is needed to proceed

Compete against the clock, earn achievements and a place on the leader boards

movies.name: Numbers and Letters Archery and Whack

name: Numbers & Letters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Numbers and Letters. Practice math, solve equations using addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Improve your literacy skills. Complete the word by finding the missing letter. Earn achievements and rank on leader boards. Numbers Archery and Numbers Whack now available.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
